alert.note: Alert for Gadsden; Jefferson; Leon; Liberty; Wakulla (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 19 at 9:02AM EDT until June 19 at 10:00AM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tallahassee has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northern Wakulla County in Big Bend of Florida... Gadsden County in Big Bend of Florida... Northern Liberty County in Big Bend of Florida... Northwestern Jefferson County in Big Bend of Florida... Leon County in Big Bend of Florida... * Until 1000 AM EDT. * At 902 AM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 8 miles northwest of Quincy to near Blountstown, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Tallahassee, Woodville, Monticello, Florida State University, Tallahassee Community College, Quincy, Havana, Midway, Florida A and M, St. Marks, Crawfordville, Doak Campbell Stadium, Greensboro, Chattahoochee, Wakulla, Gretna, Bristol, Alma, Lake Bradford and Cody. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
